mapper.sql: mbr.id as id, mbr.mbr_level_id as mbr_level_id, mbr.winery_id as winery_id, mbr.mbr_name as mbr_name, mbr.phone as phone, mbr.open_id as open_id, mbr.user_icon as user_icon, mbr.status as status, mbr.status_time as status_time, mbr.total_integral as total_integral, mbr.total_store_remain as total_store_remain, mbr.total_store_increment as total_store_increment, mbr.market_qr_code as market_qr_code, mbr.market_pid as market_pid, mbr.acct_balance as acct_balance, mbr.age as age, mbr.gender as gender, mbr.invite_return_amt as invite_return_amt, mbr.recharge_return_amt as recharge_return_amt, mbr.create_date as create_date, mbr.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_member (id, mbr_level_id, winery_id, mbr_name, phone, open_id, user_icon, status, status_time, total_integral, total_store_remain, total_store_increment, market_qr_code, market_pid, acct_balance, age, gender, return_amt, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{mbrLevelId}, #{wineryId}, #{mbrName}, #{phone}, #{openId}, #{userIcon}, #{status}, #{statusTime}, #{totalIntegral}, #{totalStoreRemain}, #{totalStoreIncrement}, #{marketQrCode}, #{marketPid}, #{acctBalance}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{invite_return_amt}, #{recharge_return_amt}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_member
mbr_level_id = #{mbrLevelId},
winery_id = #{wineryId},
mbr_name = #{mbrName},
phone = #{phone},
open_id = #{openId},
user_icon = #{userIcon},
status = #{status},
status_time = #{statusTime},
total_integral = #{totalIntegral},
total_store_remain = #{totalStoreRemain},
total_store_increment = #{totalStoreIncrement},
market_qr_code = #{marketQrCode},
market_pid = #{marketPid},
acct_balance = #{acctBalance},
age = #{age},
gender = #{gender},
invite_return_amt = #{inviteReturnAmt},
recharge_return_amt = #{rechargeReturnAmt},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select m.user_icon,m.nick_name,b.bill_amt,b.sign_type,b.create_date,l.descri from m_member m left join m_mbr_bill_record b on m.id = b.pk_id left join m_mbr_level l on m.mbr_level_id=l.id where m.market_pid =#{mbrId}
select sum(b.bill_amt) amt, count(m.id) count from m_member m left join m_mbr_bill_record b on m.id = b.pk_id left join m_mbr_level l on m.mbr_level_id=l.id where m.market_pid =#{mbrId}

select , ml.name as level_name, mw.nick_name as nick_name, IFNULL(wm.id,FALSE) as is_master from m_member as mbr left join m_mbr_level as ml on ml.id = mbr.mbr_level_id left join m_mbr_wechat as mw on mw.mbr_id = mbr.id left join b_winery_master as wm on wm.mbr_id = mbr.id where mbr.open_id = #{openId}
